New Records: Rinku Singh has scored 278 runs in 13 T20I matches, averaging 69.50 with a strike rate of 180.
Key Match Events: Rinku Singh's performance in the match against South Africa, where he scored an unbeaten 68 off 39 balls, marked a significant moment in his T20I career.
Pre-Game Insights: MS Dhoni advised Rinku Singh to stay calm and composed during high-pressure situations, which Rinku has used to his advantage in T20I matches.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rinku Singh's evolution as a finisher in both T20I and ODI formats has made him a valuable asset for India in international cricket.
